channel.title: Ping on INFOVERLOAD
channel.description: Recent content in Ping on INFOVERLOAD

item.title: How does ping work?
item.description: Chances are that you’ve probably used ping for troubleshooting purposes to test whether a host is available or you might have told someone that you’ll “ping them later” since the word has also seeped into common-ish lexicon. But what exactly is ping? Personally I have used it but not given it much thought so I wanted to dive a little deeper on how it works. Here are my findings!
